channel.title: today-i-learnt on bdcaf
channel.description: Recent content in today-i-learnt on bdcaf

item.title: pretty git exercises
item.description: I probably mentioned I use git for managing my code. Even in the simplistic way I know - already helpful. Like in this xkcd It is not easy finding good exercises to improve. I got pointed to learngitbranching. It looks polished and the exercises are short enough to do between. Just somehow I overlooked the commandos reset and undo to restart the exercised.

item.title: Github pages
item.description: Now this site is on github pages. I had already repos on github for some time and trusted it - only private repos I keep on other places. But mostly I was missing some features a bplaced so now the move. Mostly I like that I can now post new content via git so I just need to transfer new posts and not the whole site. That now the site is https secured is a nice boon.
